name: Hex Master
summary: You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession.
description: You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession. You are no longer limited to casting only a single hex each turn. In addition, when you cast cackle to sustain a hex, you gain the effects of Sustain a Spell for all your active hexes that have a duration of sustained.
